BRIDGE.name: Bridge of the Enterprise
BRIDGE.desc: You are standing on the bridge of the Enterprise. Lt. Commander Data is at the Ops, and Wesley has the helm. Mr Wolf is barking something about Romulans.

READYROOM.name: Captain's ready room
READYROOM.desc: You are in the Captain's ready room. Captain Picard is seated behind his desk, sipping tea.
items.desc: A type 1 phaser is on the Captain's desk.
items.take: You take the phaser while the Captain isn't looking and slip it into your pocket...oh wait, your uniform doesn't have pockets.

TURBOLIFT.name: Turbolife
TURBOLIFT.desc: You are in a non-descript turbolift.
